commit.message: Move manually generated nullfail tests out of auto-generated section

 ["", "CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY", "CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY", "INVALID_STACK_OPERATION", "CSV automatically fails on an empty stack"],
 ["-1", "CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY", "CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY", "NEGATIVE_LOCKTIME", "CSV automatically fails if stack top is negative"],

commit.message: CKey::Sign : switch test arg to explicit additional entropy argument
